title: About uploading photo for Id card
content: The college people told to upload the photo for the id card purpose. Can anyone tell where should I upload?

comments.body: WAIT.... WHAT??.. when did they tell?
Hello, can anyone please follow up on this. I've been trying to upload my photo for a while but it's not going my way. Thanks for any advice. (I recently joined through kcet)
Go to the website . Wait lemme send u the link
Login through ur email and put password as pes123. Then u will get to see
Have a look. I have explained u
Got it. Thanks for the link!
Did u get the mail that college starts from today?
Oh, I'm in college actually. It's true it starts from today.
